source.83bfa888:
# **Exploratory data analysis - FIFA 20**

Hello friends,

This is my first attempt in doing in exploratory data analysis on kaggle on the  **FIFA - 20 compelete player dataset**


This dataset contains the data from FIFA-15 to FIFA-20. I would be focusing on FIFA-20 data.


Hope you guys find worth your time.
